job.title: Software Test Engineer

largescale defense and homeland security simulations The successful candidate will be responsible for testing and evaluating ORCAs applications and ltligtltligt Deploying operating and maintaining application test instances andor networks ltligtltligt Ensuring compliance with general software development testing and maintenance best practices ltligtltligt Ensuring data integrity standards ltligtltligt Participating in application planning meetings ltligtltligt Evaluating software ease of usability and error handling procedures ltligtltligt Providing application instructions for users ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtDesired Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Bachelors Degree in Computer Science Electrical Engineering or
